verses.roman:
miśra kahe,--ei baḍa adbhuta kāhinī
śiśura śūnya-pade kene nūpurera dhvani

synonyms: miśra kahe—Jagannātha Miśra said; ei baḍa—this is very; adbhuta—wonderful; kāhinī—incident; śiśura—of the child; śūnya-pade—on the naked legs; kene—why; nūpurera—of the ankle bells; dhvani—sound.
translation: Jagannātha Miśra said, "This is a very wonderful incident. Why is there a sound of ankle bells from the bare feet of my child?"
